Read the latest changelog No data found‚Ä¶ Search vehicle Search here‚Ä¶ Clear search Join the ThunderDex Discord group Be part of something amazing‚Ä¶ Usage in battles: Wiki The BEST War Thunder Wikipedia app. Join the ThunderDex Subreddit Click here to join the ThunderDex subreddit üòÅ Features & plans for 2024 2024 ThunderDex Plans Preview upcoming app features test click here Coming soon! ThunderDex was initially conceived in 2023.
I was a frequent user of the War Thunder Wiki and got tired of using it on my browser.
With 10+ years of coding knowledge, I developed this app in a few months and decided to release it to everyone for FREE!

I really hope you enjoy the app! - HiFii
Hello!!

Thank you for using ThunderDex ‚ù§

The BEST and ONLY War Thunder Wikipedia client for Android.

Please, consider donating if you are enjoying the app... a LOT of work goes into this free app.

You can donate by going into the settings of the app and clicking on the PayPal, or the Cash App option!

-HiFii Support the developer on PayPal Support the developer on Cash App Add extra customization options (vehicle image size, etc)

Filter vehicles by rank instead of alphabetically

Add option to choose how vehicles are filtered

Improvements to the vehicle image viewer

Add an option to download selected vehicle images

Add more translations

Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option

Even more improvements to loading and performance

Adding more information and user requested information too

Add a wallpaper section with a download ability!! (from the war thunder Wikipedia wallpaper site)
How do I contribute? ThunderDex Contributors Tdikristof_ on Discord (Hungarian Translations) Theslimyboi on Discord (Lithuanian Translations) Flitzepipe on Discord (Original German Translations) Proxima on Discord (Updated German Translations)
‚Ä¢ Add extra customization options (vehicle image size, etc) ‚Ä¢ Improvements to the vehicle image viewer ‚Ä¢ Add more translations ‚Ä¢ Once enough languages are added, create a language chooser option ‚Ä¢ Even more improvements to loading and performance ‚Ä¢ Adding more information and user requested information too ‚Ä¢ Add a War Thunder wallpaper section with a download ability from the site
Changelog History 3.5.6:
‚Ä¢ Included original German Translation credits
‚Ä¢ Updated Hungarian translations
‚Ä¢ Fixed "upcoming features" animated background not being full screen
‚Ä¢ Misc. small fixes
‚Ä¢ Updated Gradle and Libraries

3.5.5:
‚Ä¢ Slightly reduced app size again by a couple hundred kilobytes
‚Ä¢ When you download a vehicle image, it now outputs a file with the vehicles name instead of random numbers
‚Ä¢ Fixed splash screen icon
‚Ä¢ Reintroduce "Upcoming Features" in the "About" section of the app
‚Ä¢ Included all app changelogs from 2.0.0 to the newest version, if you want to look back on updates (scroll down for updates)
‚Ä¢ Fixed splashscreen
‚Ä¢ Add German translation credits

3.5.1:
‚Ä¢ Misc. small changes

3.3.1:
‚Ä¢ Added Predictive Back Animations in the app
‚Ä¢ Redesigned the "Preview App Features" Preference
‚Ä¢ Added the ability to navigate back in the "preview upcoming app features" Preference
‚Ä¢ Updated the stars animation time in the "preview app features" preference
‚Ä¢ Updated Hungarian translations (Thanks tdikristof_ on Discord)

3.3.0 (big update):
‚Ä¢ Fix some text getting cut off on devices with smaller screens
‚Ä¢ Added a small divider in the Settings
‚Ä¢ Increased ThunderDex Header text size
‚Ä¢ Added a new setting that shows ThunderDex plans for 2024 :)
‚Ä¢ UI adjustments
‚Ä¢ Removed some of the summary text in the settings
‚Ä¢ Removed "Google Pay" donation option
‚Ä¢ Slightly redesigned the Settings
‚Ä¢ Text updates and changes
‚Ä¢ Updated Android Build Tools to 35.0.0rc3
‚Ä¢ Changed some height sizes of elements in the app
‚Ä¢ Fix text wrap issue on certain devices for the upcoming features preference

3.2.4:
‚Ä¢ Adjust vehicle image height 
‚Ä¢ Updated Android AGP
‚Ä¢ Library updates

3.2.3:
‚Ä¢ Added Android 9 support
‚Ä¢ Change text in a Dialog

3.2.2:
‚Ä¢ Adjusted vehicle image height... no more scrolling in the "wiki" tab.. :)
‚Ä¢ Fix changelog typo from 3.2.1
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes

3.2.1:
‚Ä¢ Fixed Google Pay not launching on older devices
‚Ä¢ Added an option to copy the Google Pay Email in the dialog

3.2.0:
‚Ä¢ Added cash app donation option
‚Ä¢ Added google pay donation option
‚Ä¢ Fixed up some code with the code analyzer
‚Ä¢ Changed the "Latest Updates" tab to "Latest Game Updates"
‚Ä¢ Lots of small text adjustments that you may or may not notice
‚Ä¢ Fixed all Java issues in the app
‚Ä¢ Further tweaks to elements in the app such as header height and image height

3.1.3:
‚Ä¢ Fix changelog not being up to date

3.1.2:
‚Ä¢ Updated AGP
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Performance improvements
‚Ä¢ Changed some element sizes in the app
‚Ä¢ Updated a library
‚Ä¢ Updated Build Tools
‚Ä¢ Updated Gradle

3.1.1:
‚Ä¢ Added Lithuanian and Hungarian translations (thanks to theslimyboi and Tdikristof_ on Discord for the translations)
‚Ä¢ Further reduced app size ;)
‚Ä¢ Made "ThunderDex" Header text slightly smaller
‚Ä¢ Removed some unused resources
‚Ä¢ Expanded the height of the ThunderDex Header box
‚Ä¢ Expanded the height of Vehicle Images
‚Ä¢ Updated some of the internal structuring of the apps gradle file 

3.1.0:
‚Ä¢ *** Decreased app size by ~4MB ***
‚Ä¢ Small text changes
‚Ä¢ Adjusted some UI elements
‚Ä¢ Cleaned up code
‚Ä¢ Removed unused resources
‚Ä¢ Cleaned up some backend code for the app

3.0.1:
‚Ä¢ Fix changelog typo
‚Ä¢ Small string adjustments
‚Ä¢ Removed unused drawables

3.0.0:
‚Ä¢ BRAND NEW DESIGN!
‚Ä¢ Cleaned up the user interface
‚Ä¢ Added my ThunderDexApp subreddit
‚Ä¢ planes / jets has been changed to Aircraft
‚Ä¢ Add blurred searchview
‚Ä¢ Fix toolbar glitching while collapsiing
‚Ä¢ Remove special star character from vehicle info
‚Ä¢ Removed translations setting
‚Ä¢ Removed request a feature activity 

2.5.2:
‚Ä¢ Permanent discord link added! Please join the discord group (settings > discord)
‚Ä¢ Made image gradient slightly darker
‚Ä¢ Fixed the bug where the toolbar would include the gradient 

2.5.1:
‚Ä¢ Update the discord invite link

2.5.0:
‚Ä¢ Added the "usage in battles" section for vehicles
‚Ä¢ Vehicle images are now larger! :)
‚Ä¢ Vehicle image gradient fixed and adjusted ‚Ä¢ Slight UI adjustments
‚Ä¢ Removed translations again for now
‚Ä¢ cleaned up code via suggestions from the android studio code analyzer
‚Ä¢ Updated Gradle and AGP
‚Ä¢ Reduce app size (it;s now under 10mb)

2.0.0:
‚Ä¢ VEHICLE SEARCH ADDED
‚Ä¢ Further reduce app size
‚Ä¢ Prevent Dialog from being closed when touched outside :)
‚Ä¢ Added a nice gradient for the vehicle images
